titles.title: Invest in America Act of 2015
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make the maximum capital gains rate for individuals 15 percent.
Invest in America Act of 2015

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Invest in America Act of 2015
This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to modify the formula for calculating the tax on the net capital gains of individual taxpayers to provide for a maximum 15% rate on the adjusted net capital gain of such taxpayers.
